awakened:IronFeather.NAME: Iron Feather
awakened:IronFeather.DESCRIPTION: Embedded: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block.

awakened:BarbedFeather.NAME: Barbed Feather
awakened:BarbedFeather.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Embedded: Vulnerable does not decrease at the end of the turn.

awakened:SappingFeather.NAME: Sapping Feather
awakened:SappingFeather.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Embedded: Weak does not decrease at the end of the turn.

awakened:SwiftFeather.NAME: Swift Feather
awakened:SwiftFeather.DESCRIPTION: Embedded: The first time you attack this enemy each turn, draw !M! cards.

awakened:Sludge.NAME: Sludge
awakened:Sludge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.

awakened:EnervatingAssault.NAME: Enervating Assault
awakened:EnervatingAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Hex X times.

awakened:DiveBomb.NAME: Dive Bomb
awakened:DiveBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL awakened:Awakened - Affects ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

awakened:ShieldingStrike.NAME: Shielding Strike
awakened:ShieldingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL awakened:Awakened - Gain !B! Block.

awakened:WingedRiposte.NAME: Winged Riposte
awakened:WingedRiposte.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL awakened:Awakened - Deal !D! damage !M! times.

awakened:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
awakened:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

awakened:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
awakened:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

awakened:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
awakened:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

awakened:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
awakened:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

awakened:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
awakened:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
awakened:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

awakened:AwakenedXCostDemo.NAME: Awakened X Cost
awakened:AwakenedXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
awakened:AwakenedXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

awakened:AwakenedModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Awakened Modal Choice
awakened:AwakenedModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: Draw !M! cards or gain !awakened:si! Strength.
